name: Dragonfly
tagline: An elegant webkit browser that focuses on simplicity
body:
Dragonfly
=========

Dragonfly is a web browser built with webkitgtk. It is designed to be fast and simple to use, and is inspired by projects such as surf, midori, and leafpad.

![Chicken](http://static.squarespace.com/static/5181d5b7e4b07b8c66ed5614/t/528eeee2e4b0fc15797f8ebf/1385098979427/chicken.jpg)

Dependencies
------------

Dragonfly requires gtk+ 2.0 and webkigtk 1.0.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
